translator.setlang_description: Choose the language from the menu below that you want to receive translations in.
translator.setlang_tip: ğŸ’¡ **Tip:** This language will be used automatically when using the app's context menu.
translator.success_description: Your default translation language is now:

translator.languages_footer: Use /setlang to save your default choice
